T02TD2767E:142b-0: @142b * // dpal thugs rje chen po'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2767E:142b-1: dngos grub kun gyi rgyur gyur pa //
T02TD2767E:142b-2: sgrub pa po la phan byed thabs //
T02TD2767E:142b-3: mchod sprin rgyal mtshan rtse mo yis //
T02TD2767E:142b-4: bsam mi khyab byed mchod pa bri //
T02TD2767E:142b-5: me tog bdug pa mar me dri //
T02TD2767E:142b-6: zhal zas rol mo mandal rdzas //
T02TD2767E:142b-7: 'byor pa'i khyad par gyis bkod de //
T02TD2767E:142b-8: nyid kyi nga rgyal gyis byin brlab //
T02TD2767E:142b-13: aom badzra nee bi dye a'a:h'um /
T02TD2767E:142b-16: rang bzhin stong pa nyid can gyi //
T02TD2767E:143a-2: rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i rig pa yis //
T02TD2767E:143a-3: sprul nas 'phags tshogs mchod par bya //
T02TD2767E:143a-4: aom na mo bha ga wa te /
T02TD2767E:143a-5: ma h'a k'a ru n'i ka pushpa p'u dza me gha sa mu dra ke tu r'a dz'a ya /
T02TD2767E:143a-15: aa wa k'i ra ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD2767E:143a-16: me tog dbul ba'i sngags so //
T02TD2767E:143a-23: mandal zhes bya ba la sbyar ba'i rim gyis bdug pa dang /
T02TD2767E:143a-29: gos bzang gyon zhing rgyan bzang btags //
T02TD2767E:143a-30: yi ge gsum dang ldan pa yi //
T02TD2767E:143a-31: rdo rje'i glu gar sngon song bas //
T02TD2767E:143a-32: sangs rgyas la sogs mchod par bya //
T02TD2767E:143a-33: bdag nyid mchod sprin rgya mtsho yi //
T02TD2767E:143a-34: dbus bzhugs mchod kun la mnga' brnyes //
T02TD2767E:143a-35: mgon po 'khor los sgyur rgyal tshul //
T02TD2767E:143a-36: rgyal mtshan rtse mo gser mdog bskyed //
T02TD2767E:143a-37: ye shes snying po las byung ba'i /
T02TD2767E:143a-38: sna tshogs lha mo mdzes rnams kyis //
T02TD2767E:143a-39: re re las kyang dpag tu med //
T02TD2767E:143a-40: sprul pas rim gro rdzogs par blta //
T02TD2767E:143a-41: mi phyed gus pas mang yod pas //
T02TD2767E:143a-43: nyin re dus gsum mchod byed na //
T02TD2767E:143a-44: bye ba bsam mi khyab mchod 'gyur //
T02TD2767E:143a-45: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga rdzogs so//
